title: Greencycle 3 Way Decora Switch - White, 4 Pack Three Way/Single Pole Rocker Switch, 15A 120/277V, On/Off Paddle Interrupter, Residential/Commercial Grade, UL/CUL Listed

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #31,699 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #110 in Electrical Light Switches       #110 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Thursday, June 12 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement‚Ä∫Electrical‚Ä∫Switches & Dimmers‚Ä∫Wall Switches‚Ä∫Light Switches
feature_bullets: ‚úÖ„Äê3 Way Switch Optimized Version„Äë3-way electrical light switch, rating 15A 120-277V, gloss finish, UL certified.Designed for easy control of a single fixture from 2 wall locations. Made with impact-resistant materials and designed to last, this switch is a great choice for anyone looking for a reliable and long-lasting switch.

‚úÖ„ÄêSleek and Modern„ÄëFeaturing a white decorator rocker design with smooth and quiet paddles, this switch is both elegant and modern. It's perfect for those who want a simple and stylish switch that's easy to use. With easy-to-control paddles, you'll never struggle to turn your lights on or off again. Plus, its slim design allows for multiple switches to be installed in the same wall plate.

‚úÖ„ÄêSafe and Reliable„ÄëDesigned with a self-grounding clip for automatic connection in a properly grounded metal wall box, this switch is both safe and reliable.GreenCycle residential/commercial grade three way switch, has undergone rigorous quality testing and is UL listed for added peace of mind.

‚úÖ„ÄêEasy to Install„ÄëQuick push-in and side wiring options available. Terminal screws accept up to 12AWG and quick push-in wiring accepts 14AWG solid copper wire only.Plus, it features a break-off plaster ear for the best flush alignment and a shallow body that fits standard electrical boxes.

‚úÖ„ÄêVersatile„ÄëSuitable for both residential and most commercial areas that require only 15Amp switches, this switch can be installed in a 2 or 3 gang wall plate. It's perfect for repairing or replacing old or broken rocker switches in your home, bedroom, kitchen, offices, schools, stores, shops, restaurants, public facilities, and hotels. Upgrade your space with this versatile and reliable switch from Greencycle.

‚úÖ„ÄêBest for„ÄëControlling a light fixture, appliance, or outlet from 2 wall locations.Standard single-pole switches, three-way switches, and four-way switches are all designed for standard 120-volt household circuits. And your choice will depend on whether you want to control a light fixture from one, two, or three or more wall locations.

customers_say: Customers find these switches to be of good quality and easy to install. They appreciate the value for money, with one customer noting they work as well as more expensive alternatives.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Good looking switches. A nice upgrade to my house. Easy to install. These are good quality and durable switches to last a long time. Not made of cheap flimsy materials. Has a nice smooth click and works very well.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Changes all my light switches in my house, very pleased! üòÄ

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy to install. I replaced a few cracked switches. I just hate having to get them lined up so my OCD doesn't kick in :)

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsThey work, but feel cheap
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: They all worked. They just feel, light, cheap and flimsy. The rocker isn't a positive, solid feeling, click as some others. They do what they're supposed to do, though.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: they look and work perfectly. Smooth action.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorked as well as more expensive switches
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: No issues, quality seems as good as any other for my home project.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2024
